Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.3 Paccayavāra » 11.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 11.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
Ācayagāmittika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
24.
1499Apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā…  nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā…  purejātapaccayā…  āsevanapaccayā…  kammapaccayā…  vipākapaccayā…  āhārapaccayā…  indriyapaccayā…  jhānapaccayā…  maggapaccayā…  sampayuttapaccayā…  vippayuttapaccayā…  atthipaccayā…  natthipaccayā…  vigatapaccayā…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Anantarādiup11.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
